title: From Occident to Orient.
author: Smith, William Alexander.
snippet: Retracing our steps we regain  our wagon and drive back a couple of miles for a visit to the Crags of Cartland, where an old Roman bridge hangs over a deep chasm of the Mouse water, a hundred feet or more in depth.

title: Waverley Novels. (Abbotsford edition.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Sir Simon Lockhart of Lee and Cartland madea considerable figure in the reigns of Robert theBruce and of his son David.

title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Sir Simon Lockhart of Lee and Cartland made aconsiderable figure in the reigns of Robert the Bruceand of his son David.
